description: This file defines a React component 'ClientShell' which serves as a layout wrapper for the client-side part of a Next.js application. It imports and uses components and hooks such as NavBar, Sidebar, and NotesProvider, and organizes the main page structure with flex layout.

methods.name: ClientShell
methods.description: React functional component that provides a layout with navigation, sidebar, and content area, wrapping children components with NotesProvider context.
